import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import moment from 'moment' import Markdown from '../../components/atoms/Markdown' import styles from './Asset.module.scss' const AssetLink = ({ asset, list }: { asset: any; list?: boolean }) => { return list ? (

{asset.name}

{moment(asset.datePublished, 'YYYYMMDD').fromNow()}
) : (

{asset.name}

{asset.categories &&
{asset.categories[0]}
}
) } export default AssetLink
